text: (pirimi vuvada, kāntāvan vuvada) obagen yamkisivekuṭat jīvana sahakaruveku nosiṭiyahot ovunṭa vivāha kara denu. (esēma jīvana sahakaruvan næti) obagē vahalūngen vū hon̆da ayaṭada vivāha kara denu. ovun duppatun vuvada, allāh tamangē dayāva magin ovunva pohosatun bavaṭa pat karanu æta. (dānamāna kirīmehi) allāh itāmat vaśālavantayeku hā (minisungē tatvaya) hon̆din danneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
